author: Andras LOHF
comment: Sound and vibration lags behind pretty badly on fast tempos making it pretty much unusable.

reply.author: Felker Tech
reply.content:
Hey, I'm sorry to hear that it isn't working at fast tempos. If you want to offer a little more feedback, please email me felker.tech@gmail.com

It's worked in my cases, which were admittedly slow tempos. Can you specify what tempos you're using? 

Thanks.

title: Nice design

author: David Talley
comment: Having issues with it opening up with wear 2.0 on Huawei watch.  Clinking on the link open in wear, does nothing.  Can't find it on the phone as well.

reply.author: Felker Tech
reply.content: Sorry to hear that. This has never been updated to work with Wear 2.0.

reply.author: Felker Tech
reply.content: Not sure what you mean, although I am currently planning a visual overhaul of the app. Let me know if you have any suggestions.
